=== Function and other keys ===
The Acer keys work if you install acerhk package with lineak. After that, I edited the ''/etc/lineakkb.def'' file and added:
----
<pre>
[ACE-TM4650LMI]
  brandname = "Acer"
  modelname = "Travelmate 4650LMi"
  [KEYS]
    Help             = 245
    Setup            = 193
    P1               = 159
    P2               = 151
    Sleep            = 223
    WWW              = 178
    Mail             = 236
    AudioMute        = 160
    AudioLowerVolume = 174
    AudioRaiseVolume = 176
  [END KEYS]
[END ACE-TM4650LMI]
</pre>
----
After playing with the lineakd and configuring for the user, I have in the ~/.lineakd/lineakd.conf the following settings:
----
<pre>
Help = "khelpcenter"
Setup = "kcontrol"
P1 = "konsole"
P2 = "krusader"
Sleep = "sudo /etc/acpi/sleep.sh"
AudioLowerVolume = "KMIX_VOLDOWN"
AudioMute = "KMIX_MUTE"
AudioRaiseVolume = "KMIX_VOLUP"
Mail = "KMAIL_COMPOSE"
WWW = "firefox"
</pre>
----
